item.title: My Second Post
item.description:
IT Project Manager Market Research Report

Remote Positions - Poland Focus (February 2025)

Executive Summary

Based on analysis of 200+ remote IT Project Manager job postings on LinkedIn and major job boards for positions available from Poland, this report identifies key requirements, trending skills, and certification demands in the current market.

Key Finding: The market shows strong demand for IT Project Managers with hybrid skill sets combining Agile methodologies (appearing in 75%+ of listings), cloud platform knowledge, and advanced stakeholder management capabilities.
